newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: RUGBY UNION-JOUBERT RECALLED TO SPRINBOK TEAM.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-JOUBERT RECALLED TO SPRINBOK TEAM.

text.p: Natal fullback Andre Joubert has been recalled by South Africa for the Tri-Nations rugby union test against Australia in Pretoria on Saturday.
Joubert replaces Russell Bennett, who had to withdraw with a stress fracture of the ankle.
There has also been a change in the pack where Northern Transvaal lock Krynauw Otto, who failed a fitness test on Tuesday, makes way for Western Province's Fritz van Heerden.
